name: Winc, Inc.
description: Provider of an online platform designed to offer personalized wine subscription service. The company's online platform helps to discover and buy wine easily, enabling users to get 4 bottles of wine delivered at their door every month.
one_liner: Provider of an online platform designed to offer personalized wine subscription service. The company's online platform helps to discover and buy wine easily, enabling users to get 4 bottles of wine delivered at their door every month.
